DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 Study Latanoprost Punctal Plug Delivery System Subjects With Ocular Hypertension Open-Angle Glaucoma
DOC.criteria: Over 18 yrs age ocular hypertension openangle glaucoma Subjects best correct visual acuity 20/100 good Subjects wear contact lens . Uncontrolled medical condition Subjects require chronic topical artifical tear , lubricant and/or require chronic topical medication Subjects history chronic recurrent inflammatory eye disease
